protocol.text: ID_REF =  VALUE = RMA normalized log2 expression
The plants were grown at 22 C with 14 hrs photoperiod
Trizol extraction of total RNA was performed according to the manufacturer's instructions.
Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 15 ug total RNA.
Following fragmentation, 15 ug of cRNA were hybridized for 16 hr at 45 C on GeneChip ATH1 Array. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 400.
GeneChips were scanned using the Agilent GeneArray Scanner 2500.
Log2 (expression values) were extracted using robust multi-array analysis (RMA) implemented in the function rma() in the Bioconductor software package affy.
